{"version":3,"file":"background.js","mappings":";;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AADA;AACA;;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;;AAEA;;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AA+BA;AAAA;AA/BA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAGA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAGA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAGA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAGA;AAAA;AAAA;AAfA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAkBA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAYA;AAAA;AAZA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAaA;AAAA;AAbA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAGA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAgBA;AAAA;AAhBA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAGA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAGA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;;;;;;AClIA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;;;;ACvBA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;;;;;ACPA;;;;;ACAA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;;;;;;;;;;;;ACLA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AADA;;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAXA;AAAA;AAAA;AAaA;AACA;AACA","sources":["webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/./src/features/input-sim.js","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/webpack/bootstrap","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/webpack/runtime/define property getters","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/webpack/runtime/hasOwnProperty shorthand","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/webpack/runtime/make namespace object","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/./src/entry/background.js"],"sourcesContent":["// src/features/input-sim.js\n// This runs in BACKGROUND context\n\nlet virtualMouse = { x: 100, y: 100 };\n\nconst KEY_DEFINITIONS = {\n    'j': { code: 'KeyJ', key: 'j', text: 'j', keyCode: 74 },\n    'k': { code: 'KeyK', key: 'k', text: 'k', keyCode: 75 },\n    'r': { code: 'KeyR', key: 'r', text: 'r', keyCode: 82 },\n    'Enter': { code: 'Enter', key: 'Enter', text: '\\r', keyCode: 13 },\n    'Escape': { code: 'Escape', key: 'Escape', text: '', keyCode: 27 },\n    'ArrowDown': { code: 'ArrowDown', key: 'ArrowDown', text: '', keyCode: 40 },\n    'ArrowUp': { code: 'ArrowUp', key: 'ArrowUp', text: '', keyCode: 38 }\n};\n\n// --- PHYSICS ENGINE ---\n\nfunction cubicBezier(t, p0, p1, p2, p3) {\n    const oneMinusT = 1 - t;\n    const oneMinusTSqr = oneMinusT * oneMinusT;\n    const oneMinusTCube = oneMinusTSqr * oneMinusT;\n    const tSqr = t * t;\n    const tCube = tSqr * t;\n    \n    const x = oneMinusTCube * p0.x + 3 * oneMinusTSqr * t * p1.x + 3 * oneMinusT * tSqr * p2.x + tCube * p3.x;\n    const y = oneMinusTCube * p0.y + 3 * oneMinusTSqr * t * p1.y + 3 * oneMinusT * tSqr * p2.y + tCube * p3.y;\n    return { x, y };\n}\n\nfunction generateHumanPath(start, end) {\n    const distance = Math.hypot(end.x - start.x, end.y - start.y);\n    \n    // Less dramatic arc for short moves, more for long ones\n    const arcScale = Math.min(distance * 0.3, 100); \n    const spread = (Math.random() - 0.5) * arcScale;\n\n    const p0 = start;\n    const p3 = end;\n    \n    const p1 = {\n        x: start.x + (end.x - start.x) * 0.25 + spread,\n        y: start.y + (end.y - start.y) * 0.25 + spread\n    };\n    \n    const p2 = {\n        x: start.x + (end.x - start.x) * 0.75 + spread,\n        y: start.y + (end.y - start.y) * 0.75 - spread \n    };\n\n    return { p0, p1, p2, p3, distance };\n}\n\nexport async function moveMouseSmoothly(tabId, toX, toY) {\n    const start = { ...virtualMouse };\n    const end = { x: toX, y: toY };\n    \n    const path = generateHumanPath(start, end);\n    \n    // SLOWER SPEED: 0.5 pixels per ms (was 0.8)\n    // This makes the cursor feel \"heavier\" and less erratic.\n    const speed = 0.5; \n    const duration = Math.max(path.distance / speed, 400); // Minimum 400ms duration\n    const steps = Math.floor(duration / 8); \n\n    for (let i = 0; i <= steps; i++) {\n        const t = i / steps;\n        \n        // Smoother easing (Ease-In-Out-Sine approximation)\n        const easedT = -(Math.cos(Math.PI * t) - 1) / 2;\n        \n        const pos = cubicBezier(easedT, path.p0, path.p1, path.p2, path.p3);\n        \n        try {\n            await chrome.debugger.sendCommand({ tabId }, \"Input.dispatchMouseEvent\", {\n                type: \"mouseMoved\", x: pos.x, y: pos.y, button: \"none\", clickCount: 0\n            });\n            chrome.tabs.sendMessage(tabId, { type: \"DRAW_CURSOR\", x: pos.x, y: pos.y }).catch(() => {});\n        } catch (e) { break; }\n        \n        await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 8)); \n    }\n    \n    virtualMouse = end;\n}\n\nexport async function clickMouse(tabId) {\n    const { x, y } = virtualMouse;\n    try {\n        await chrome.debugger.sendCommand({ tabId }, \"Input.dispatchMouseEvent\", { type: \"mousePressed\", x, y, button: \"left\", clickCount: 1 });\n        chrome.tabs.sendMessage(tabId, { type: \"DRAW_CLICK\" }).catch(() => {});\n        \n        // Longer hold time (human click)\n        const holdTime = Math.floor(Math.random() * (180 - 90 + 1) + 90);\n        await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, holdTime));\n        \n        await chrome.debugger.sendCommand({ tabId }, \"Input.dispatchMouseEvent\", { type: \"mouseReleased\", x, y, button: \"left\", clickCount: 1 });\n    } catch(e) {}\n}\n\nexport async function typeKeys(tabId, text) {\n    try {\n        for (const char of text) {\n            await chrome.debugger.sendCommand({ tabId }, \"Input.dispatchKeyEvent\", { type: \"keyDown\", text: char });\n            \n            // Slower typing\n            const typeSpeed = Math.random() * 80 + 40;\n            await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, typeSpeed));\n            \n            await chrome.debugger.sendCommand({ tabId }, \"Input.dispatchKeyEvent\", { type: \"keyUp\", text: char });\n            await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, typeSpeed)); \n        }\n    } catch(e) {}\n}\n\nexport async function pressKey(tabId, keyName, modifiers = 0) {\n    const def = KEY_DEFINITIONS[keyName] || { key: keyName, code: keyName, text: \"\" };\n    \n    try {\n        await chrome.debugger.sendCommand({ tabId }, \"Input.dispatchKeyEvent\", { \n            type: \"keyDown\", key: def.key, code: def.code, text: def.text, unmodifiedText: def.text,\n            windowsVirtualKeyCode: def.keyCode, nativeVirtualKeyCode: def.keyCode, modifiers \n        });\n\n        // Key hold\n        await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, Math.random() * 60 + 60));\n\n        await chrome.debugger.sendCommand({ tabId }, \"Input.dispatchKeyEvent\", { \n            type: \"keyUp\", key: def.key, code: def.code, modifiers \n        });\n    } catch(e) { console.error(\"Key Error:\", e); }\n}","// The module cache\nvar __webpack_module_cache__ = {};\n\n// The require function\nfunction __webpack_require__(moduleId) {\n\t// Check if module is in cache\n\tvar cachedModule = __webpack_module_cache__[moduleId];\n\tif (cachedModule !== undefined) {\n\t\treturn cachedModule.exports;\n\t}\n\t// Create a new module (and put it into the cache)\n\tvar module = __webpack_module_cache__[moduleId] = {\n\t\t// no module.id needed\n\t\t// no module.loaded needed\n\t\texports: {}\n\t};\n\n\t// Execute the module function\n\t__webpack_modules__[moduleId](module, module.exports, __webpack_require__);\n\n\t// Return the exports of the module\n\treturn module.exports;\n}\n\n","// define getter functions for harmony exports\n__webpack_require__.d = (exports, definition) => {\n\tfor(var key in definition) {\n\t\tif(__webpack_require__.o(definition, key) && !__webpack_require__.o(exports, key)) {\n\t\t\tObject.defineProperty(exports, key, { enumerable: true, get: definition[key] });\n\t\t}\n\t}\n};","__webpack_require__.o = (obj, prop) => (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(obj, prop))","// define __esModule on exports\n__webpack_require__.r = (exports) => {\n\tif(typeof Symbol !== 'undefined' && Symbol.toStringTag) {\n\t\tObject.defineProperty(exports, Symbol.toStringTag, { value: 'Module' });\n\t}\n\tObject.defineProperty(exports, '__esModule', { value: true });\n};","import { moveMouseSmoothly, clickMouse, typeKeys, pressKey } from '../features/input-sim.js';\n\n// --- OPEN DASHBOARD (Icon Click) ---\nchrome.action.onClicked.addListener(() => {\n    chrome.tabs.create({ url: \"dashboard.html\" });\n});\n\n// --- MESSAGE HANDLER ---\nchrome.runtime.onMessage.addListener((req, sender, sendResponse) => {\n    \n    // 1. Open Dashboard request from Content Script (Panel)\n    if (req.action === \"OPEN_DASHBOARD\") {\n        chrome.tabs.create({ url: \"dashboard.html\" });\n        return; // Synchronous\n    }\n\n    const tabId = sender.tab?.id;\n    if (!tabId) return;\n\n    if (req.action === \"ATTACH_DEBUGGER\") {\n        chrome.debugger.attach({ tabId }, \"1.3\", () => {\n            if (chrome.runtime.lastError) console.log(\"Debugger attached\");\n        });\n        return;\n    }\n\n    // 2. Handle Input Actions Synchronously\n    // We wrap this in an async function and return true to keep the message channel open\n    const handleInput = async () => {\n        try {\n            if (req.action === \"MOVE_MOUSE\") await moveMouseSmoothly(tabId, req.x, req.y);\n            if (req.action === \"CLICK\") await clickMouse(tabId);\n            if (req.action === \"TYPE\") await typeKeys(tabId, req.text);\n            if (req.action === \"PRESS\") await pressKey(tabId, req.key, req.modifier);\n            \n            sendResponse({ status: \"done\" });\n        } catch (e) {\n            sendResponse({ status: \"error\", message: e.message });\n        }\n    };\n\n    handleInput();\n    return true; // CRITICAL: Tells Chrome we will sendResponse asynchronously\n});"],"names":[],"ignoreList":[],"sourceRoot":""}
END FILE: ./dist/background.js.map

START FILE: ./dist/dashboard.js

function _defineProperty(e, r, t) { return (r = _toPropertyKey(r)) in e ? Object.defineProperty(e, r, { value: t, enumerable: !0, configurable: !0, writable: !0 }) : e[r] = t, e; }

function _toPrimitive(t, r) { if ("object" != _typeof(t) || !t) return t; var e = t[Symbol.toPrimitive]; if (void 0 !== e) { var i = e.call(t, r || "default"); if ("object" != _typeof(i)) return i; throw new TypeError("@@toPrimitive must return a primitive value."); } return ("string" === r ? (o = l === n) && (u = i[(c = i[4]) ? 5 : (c = 3, 3)], i[4] = i[5] = e) : i[0] <= d && ((o = r < 2 && d < i[1]) ? (c = 0, G.v = n, G.n = i[1]) : d < l && (o = r < 3 || i[0] > n || n > l) && (i[4] = r, i[5] = n, G.n = l, c = 0)); } if (o || r > 1) return a; throw y = !0, n; } return function (o, p, l) { if (f > 1) throw TypeError("Generator is already running"); for (y && 1 === p && d(p, l), c = p, u = l; (t = c < 2 ? e : u) || !y;) { i || (c ? c < 3 ? Object.setPrototypeOf(e, GeneratorFunctionPrototype) : (e.__proto__ = GeneratorFunctionPrototype, _regeneratorDefine2(e, o, "GeneratorFunction")), e.prototype = Object.create(u), e; } return GeneratorFunction.prototype = GeneratorFunctionPrototype, _regeneratorDefine2(u, "constructor", GeneratorFunctionPrototype), _regeneratorDefine2(GeneratorFunctionPrototype, "constructor", GeneratorFunction), GeneratorFunction.displayName = "GeneratorFunction", _regeneratorDefine2(GeneratorFunctionPrototype, o, "GeneratorFunction"), _regeneratorDefine2(u), _regeneratorDefine2(u, o, "Generator"), _regeneratorDefine2(u, n, function () { return this; }), _regeneratorDefine2(u, "toString", function () { return "[object Generator]"; }), (_regenerator = function _regenerator() { return { w: i, m: f }; })(); }
function _regeneratorDefine2(e, r, n, t) { var i = Object.defineProperty; try { i({}, "", {}); } catch (e) { i = 0; } _regeneratorDefine2 = function _regeneratorDefine(e, r, n, t) { function o(r, n) { _regeneratorDefine2(e, r, function (e) { return this._invoke(r, n, e); }); } r ? i ? i(e, r, { value: n, enumerable: !t, configurable: !t, writable: !t }) : e[r] = n : (o("next", 0), o("throw", 1), o("return", 2)); }, _regeneratorDefine2(e, r, n, t); }
function asyncGeneratorStep(n, t, e, r, o, a, c) { try { var i = n[a](c), u = i.value; } catch (n) { return void e(n); } i.done ? t(u) : Promise.resolve(u).then(r, o); }

// src/core/database.js

/******/ 	// The module cache
/******/ 	var __webpack_module_cache__ = {};
/******/ 	
/******/ 	// The require function
/******/ 	function __webpack_require__(moduleId) {
/******/ 		// Check if module is in cache
/******/ 		var cachedModule = __webpack_module_cache__[moduleId];
/******/ 		if (cachedModule !== undefined) {
/******/ 			return cachedModule.exports;
/******/ 		}
/******/ 		// Create a new module (and put it into the cache)
/******/ 		var module = __webpack_module_cache__[moduleId] = {
/******/ 			// no module.id needed
/******/ 			// no module.loaded needed
/******/ 			exports: {}
/******/ 		};
/******/ 	
/******/ 		// Execute the module function
/******/ 		__webpack_modules__[moduleId](module, module.exports, __webpack_require__);
/******/ 	
/******/ 		// Return the exports of the module
/******/ 		return module.exports;
/******/ 	}
/******/ 	
/************************************************************************/
/******/ 	/* webpack/runtime/define property getters */
/******/ 	(() => {
/******/ 		// define getter functions for harmony exports
/******/ 		__webpack_require__.d = (exports, definition) => {
/******/ 			for(var key in definition) {
/******/ 				if(__webpack_require__.o(definition, key) && !__webpack_require__.o(exports, key)) {
/******/ 					Object.defineProperty(exports, key, { enumerable: true, get: definition[key] });
/******/ 				}
/******/ 			}
/******/ 		};
/******/ 	})();
/******/ 	
/******/ 	/* webpack/runtime/hasOwnProperty shorthand */
/******/ 	(() => {
/******/ 		__webpack_require__.o = (obj, prop) => (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(obj, prop))
/******/ 	})();
/******/ 	
/******/ 	/* webpack/runtime/make namespace object */
/******/ 	(() => {
/******/ 		// define __esModule on exports
/******/ 		__webpack_require__.r = (exports) => {
/******/ 			if(typeof Symbol !== 'undefined' && Symbol.toStringTag) {
/******/ 				Object.defineProperty(exports, Symbol.toStringTag, { value: 'Module' });
/******/ 			}
/******/ 			Object.defineProperty(exports, '__esModule', { value: true });
/******/ 		};
/******/ 	})();

// --- TABS ---
function initTabs() {
  var tabs = document.querySelectorAll('.menu-item');
  tabs.forEach(function (tab) {
    tab.addEventListener('click', function () {
      // Remove active
      document.querySelectorAll('.menu-item').forEach(function (el) {
        return el.classList.remove('active');
      });
      document.querySelectorAll('.tab-content').forEach(function (el) {
        return el.classList.remove('active');
      });
      // Add active
      tab.classList.add('active');
      var target = tab.getAttribute('data-tab');
      document.getElementById("tab-".concat(target)).classList.add('active');
    });
  });
}

// --- CONFIGURATION ---

  return _loadSettings.apply(this, arguments);
}

      }

{"version":3,"file":"content.js","mappings":";;;;;;;;;;;;;;AAAA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AAMA;;;;;;;;;;;;;;ACnBA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;ACZA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AADA;;AAEA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;;;;;;;;;;;;;;AC5DA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AADA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAJA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAKA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAJA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAKA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AANA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAOA;;;;;;;;;;;;;;AClBA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;AC9CA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AAEA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;;;;;;;;;;;;;;AC1BA;;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAiFA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AAeA;AAEA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;AC/IA;;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;;;;;;AC1BA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;;;;ACvBA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;;;;;ACPA;;;;;ACAA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;ACLA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AADA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAGA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAIA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAGA;AACA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAKA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAGA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAGA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAIA;AACA;AACA;;AAEA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAGA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAGA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAGA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAGA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAEA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AAAA;AACA;AACA;;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AAEA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA;AACA","sources":["webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/./src/config/constants.js","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/./src/config/selectors.js","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/./src/core/database.js","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/./src/core/logger.js","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/./src/features/ghost-cursor.js","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/./src/features/scanner.js","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/./src/features/ui-panel.js","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/./src/utils/helpers.js","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/webpack/bootstrap","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/webpack/runtime/define property getters","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/webpack/runtime/hasOwnProperty shorthand","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/webpack/runtime/make namespace object","webpack://x-ghost-bot-pro/./src/entry/content.js"],"sourcesContent":["export const CONFIG = {\n    // Bot Behavior\n    WORK_MIN: 15,\n    WORK_MAX: 45,\n    SLEEP_MIN: 5,\n    SLEEP_MAX: 15,\n    ACTIONS_PER_SESSION: 20,\n    \n    // Safety\n    SIMULATION_MODE: true, // Defaults to safety\n    \n    // Content\n    KEYWORDS: [\"gm\", \"good morning\", \"morning\", \"rise\", \"coffee\"],\n    REPLIES: [\n        \"GM! \",\n        \"Rise and grind!\",\n        \"Have a wonderful day!\",\n        \"GM fam! \"\n    ]\n};","export const SELECTORS = {\n    TWEET: 'article[data-testid=\"tweet\"]',\n    TEXT: 'div[data-testid=\"tweetText\"]',\n    USER: 'div[data-testid=\"User-Name\"]',\n    \n    // Actions\n    REPLY_BTN: 'button[data-testid=\"reply\"]',\n    INPUT_YZ: 'div[data-testid=\"tweetTextarea_0\"]', // The text box\n    SEND_BTN: 'button[data-testid=\"tweetButton\"]',\n    \n    // Modals\n    DISCARD_BTN: '[data-testid=\"confirmationSheetCancel\"]',\n    CONFIRM_DISCARD: '[data-testid=\"confirmationSheetConfirm\"]'\n};","// src/core/database.js\n\nconst DB_NAME = 'GhostBotDB';\nconst STORE = 'interactions';\n\nexport const Database = {\n    async open() {\n        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {\n            const req = indexedDB.open(DB_NAME, 1);\n            req.onupgradeneeded = (e) => {\n                const db = e.target.result;\n                if (!db.objectStoreNames.contains(STORE)) {\n                    db.createObjectStore(STORE, { keyPath: 'id', autoIncrement: true });\n                }\n            };\n            req.onsuccess = () => resolve(req.result);\n            req.onerror = () => reject(req.error);\n        });\n    },\n\n    async add(record) {\n        const db = await this.open();\n        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {\n            const tx = db.transaction(STORE, 'readwrite');\n            const store = tx.objectStore(STORE);\n            store.add({\n                ...record,\n                timestamp: new Date().toISOString()\n            });\n            tx.oncomplete = () => resolve();\n            tx.onerror = () => reject(tx.error);\n        });\n    },\n\n    async getAll() {\n        const db = await this.open();\n        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {\n            const tx = db.transaction(STORE, 'readonly');\n            const store = tx.objectStore(STORE);\n            const req = store.getAll();\n            req.onsuccess = () => {\n                // Sort by newest first\n                const sorted = req.result.sort((a, b) => \n                    new Date(b.timestamp) - new Date(a.timestamp)\n                );\n                resolve(sorted);\n            };\n            req.onerror = () => reject(req.error);\n        });\n    },\n\n    async clear() {\n        const db = await this.open();\n        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {\n            const tx = db.transaction(STORE, 'readwrite');\n            const store = tx.objectStore(STORE);\n            const req = store.clear();\n            req.onsuccess = () => resolve();\n            req.onerror = () => reject(req.error);\n        });\n    }\n};","export const Logger = {\n    info: async (msg) => {\n        const entry = `[${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}]  ${msg}`;\n        console.log(entry);\n        await Logger.save(entry);\n    },\n    error: async (msg) => {\n        const entry = `[${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}]  ${msg}`;\n        console.error(entry);\n        await Logger.save(entry);\n    },\n    save: async (entry) => {\n        const data = await chrome.storage.local.get(\"logs\");\n        const logs = data.logs || [];\n        logs.unshift(entry);\n        if (logs.length > 100) logs.pop(); // Keep last 100\n        await chrome.storage.local.set({ logs });\n    }\n};","// src/features/ghost-cursor.js\nlet cursorEl = null;\n\nexport const GhostCursor = {\n    init() {\n        if (document.getElementById('ghost-cursor')) return;\n        \n        cursorEl = document.createElement('div');\n        cursorEl.id = 'ghost-cursor';\n        \n        // Define styles inline to ensure they apply\n        Object.assign(cursorEl.style, {\n            position: 'fixed', \n            top: '0', \n            left: '0', \n            width: '18px', \n            height: '18px',\n            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 0, 50, 0.8)', \n            border: '2px solid white', \n            borderRadius: '50%',\n            zIndex: '2147483647', \n            pointerEvents: 'none', \n            transition: 'transform 0.15s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.1, 0.25, 1)', // Smooth CSS interpolation\n            transform: 'translate3d(-100px, -100px, 0)',\n            boxShadow: '0 0 15px rgba(255, 0, 50, 0.6)'\n        });\n        \n        document.documentElement.appendChild(cursorEl);\n    },\n\n    move(x, y) {\n        if (!cursorEl) this.init();\n        cursorEl.style.transform = `translate3d(${x}px, ${y}px, 0)`;\n    },\n\n    click() {\n        if (!cursorEl) return;\n        const oldColor = cursorEl.style.backgroundColor;\n        cursorEl.style.backgroundColor = '#00ff41'; // Bright green click\n        cursorEl.style.transform += ' scale(0.8)';\n        \n        setTimeout(() => {\n            cursorEl.style.backgroundColor = oldColor;\n            cursorEl.style.transform = cursorEl.style.transform.replace(' scale(0.8)', '');\n        }, 150);\n    }\n};","import { SELECTORS } from '../config/selectors.js';\n\nexport const Scanner = {\n    readActiveTweet() {\n        // RELIABILITY UPGRADE: \n        // When using 'J', Twitter natively focuses the tweet element.\n        // We can just grab 'document.activeElement' which is 100% accurate.\n        const focused = document.activeElement;\n        const article = focused?.closest(SELECTORS.TWEET);\n        \n        if (!article) return null;\n        \n        const textEl = article.querySelector(SELECTORS.TEXT);\n        const userEl = article.querySelector(SELECTORS.USER);\n        \n        return {\n            text: textEl ? textEl.innerText.toLowerCase() : \"\",\n            user: userEl ? userEl.innerText : \"Unknown\",\n            element: article\n        };\n    },\n\n    hasKeyword(text, keywords) {\n        if (!text) return false;\n        return keywords.some(k => text.includes(k.toLowerCase()));\n    }\n};","// src/features/ui-panel.js\n\nexport const Panel = {\n    el: null,\n    statusEl: null,\n    logContainer: null,\n\n    init() {\n        if (document.getElementById('ghost-panel')) return;\n\n        const style = document.createElement('style');\n        style.textContent = `\n            #ghost-panel {\n                position: fixed; \n                top: 20px; \n                bottom: 20px; \n                left: 20px;\n                width: 280px; /* Fixed width as requested */\n                background: rgba(10, 10, 10, 0.95); \n                color: #e0e0e0;\n                border: 1px solid #333; \n                border-radius: 8px;\n                padding: 12px; \n                font-family: 'Segoe UI', system-ui, sans-serif; \n                font-size: 12px;\n                z-index: 2147483647; \n                box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);\n                backdrop-filter: blur(8px);\n                transition: opacity 0.2s;\n                user-select: none;\n                \n                /* FLEX LAYOUT FOR FULL HEIGHT */\n                display: flex;\n                flex-direction: column;\n            }\n            #ghost-panel:hover { opacity: 1; }\n            \n            .ghost-header { \n                display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; \n                margin-bottom: 10px; padding-bottom: 8px; border-bottom: 1px solid #333; \n                flex-shrink: 0;\n            }\n            .ghost-title { font-weight: 700; font-size: 14px; color: #fff; letter-spacing: 0.5px; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px;}\n            \n            .ghost-status { \n                padding: 3px 8px; border-radius: 4px; font-weight: 700; font-size: 10px; \n                background: #222; color: #777; border: 1px solid #333; letter-spacing: 0.5px;\n                transition: all 0.3s;\n            }\n            .ghost-status.running { \n                background: rgba(0, 255, 65, 0.15); color: #00ff41; border-color: #00ff41; \n                box-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(0, 255, 65, 0.2);\n            }\n\n            /* FLEXIBLE CONSOLE AREA */\n            .ghost-console {\n                flex-grow: 1; /* Fills all remaining height */\n                overflow-y: auto;\n                background: #000;\n                border: 1px solid #222;\n                border-radius: 4px;\n                padding: 8px;\n                margin-bottom: 10px;\n                display: flex;\n                flex-direction: column-reverse; \n            }\n            \n            .log-entry {\n                font-family: 'Consolas', 'Monaco', monospace;\n                font-size: 11px;\n                margin-bottom: 4px;\n                line-height: 1.4;\n                color: #888;\n                border-bottom: 1px solid #111;\n                word-wrap: break-word;\n            }\n            .log-entry:first-child { color: #00ff41; font-weight: 600; } \n            .log-entry.error { color: #ff4444; }\n            .log-entry .time { color: #555; margin-right: 4px; font-size: 10px; }\n\n            .ghost-console::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 4px; }\n            .ghost-console::-webkit-scrollbar-track { background: #111; }\n            .ghost-console::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: #444; border-radius: 2px; }\n\n            .ghost-footer { \n                display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; \n                color: #666; font-size: 11px; flex-shrink: 0;\n            }\n            .key-badge { background: #2a2a2a; padding: 2px 5px; border-radius: 4px; color: #eee; border: 1px solid #444; font-size: 10px;}\n            .dash-link { color: #1d9bf0; text-decoration: none; cursor: pointer; transition: color 0.2s; font-weight: 600;}\n            .dash-link:hover { color: #fff; text-decoration: underline; }\n        `;\n        document.head.appendChild(style);\n\n        this.el = document.createElement('div');\n        this.el.id = 'ghost-panel';\n        this.el.innerHTML = `\n            <div class=\"ghost-header\">\n                <span class=\"ghost-title\"> Ghost Bot</span>\n                <span id=\"ghost-status\" class=\"ghost-status\">STOPPED</span>\n            </div>\n            \n            <div id=\"ghost-console\" class=\"ghost-console\">\n                <div class=\"log-entry\">UI Initialized. Height Maximized.</div>\n            </div>\n\n            <div class=\"ghost-footer\">\n                <span>Toggle: <span class=\"key-badge\">Alt</span> + <span class=\"key-badge\">S</span></span>\n                <a id=\"ghost-dash-link\" class=\"dash-link\">Dashboard </a>\n            </div>\n        `;\n        document.body.appendChild(this.el);\n\n        this.statusEl = this.el.querySelector('#ghost-status');\n        this.logContainer = this.el.querySelector('#ghost-console');\n\n        this.el.querySelector('#ghost-dash-link').addEventListener('click', () => {\n            chrome.runtime.sendMessage({ action: \"OPEN_DASHBOARD\" });\n        });\n    },\n\n    setStatus(isRunning) {\n        if (!this.statusEl) return;\n        if (isRunning) {\n            this.statusEl.textContent = \"RUNNING\";\n            this.statusEl.className = \"ghost-status running\";\n        } else {\n            this.statusEl.textContent = \"STOPPED\";\n            this.statusEl.className = \"ghost-status\";\n        }\n    },\n\n    log(msg, type = 'info') {\n        if (!this.logContainer) return;\n        const time = new Date().toLocaleTimeString().split(' ')[0];\n        const entry = document.createElement('div');\n        entry.className = type === 'error' ? 'log-entry error' : 'log-entry';\n        entry.innerHTML = `<span class=\"time\">[${time}]</span> ${msg}`;\n        this.logContainer.prepend(entry);\n        if (this.logContainer.children.length > 100) {\n            this.logContainer.removeChild(this.logContainer.lastChild);\n        }\n    }\n};","// src/utils/helpers.js\n\nexport const wait = (ms) => new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms));\n\nexport const random = (min, max) => Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1) + min);\n\nexport const randomGaussian = (min, max, skew = 1) => {\n    let u = 0, v = 0;\n    while(u === 0) u = Math.random(); \n    while(v === 0) v = Math.random();\n    let num = Math.sqrt( -2.0 * Math.log( u ) ) * Math.cos( 2.0 * Math.PI * v );\n    \n    num = num / 10.0 + 0.5;\n    if (num > 1 || num < 0) num = randomGaussian(min, max, skew); \n    num = Math.pow(num, skew); \n    num *= max - min; \n    num += min; \n    return Math.floor(num);\n}\n\nexport const getElementCenter = (el) => {\n    const rect = el.getBoundingClientRect();\n    return {\n        x: rect.left + (rect.width / 2),\n        y: rect.top + (rect.height / 2)\n    };\n};","// The module cache\nvar __webpack_module_cache__ = {};\n\n// The require function\nfunction __webpack_require__(moduleId) {\n\t// Check if module is in cache\n\tvar cachedModule = __webpack_module_cache__[moduleId];\n\tif (cachedModule !== undefined) {\n\t\treturn cachedModule.exports;\n\t}\n\t// Create a new module (and put it into the cache)\n\tvar module = __webpack_module_cache__[moduleId] = {\n\t\t// no module.id needed\n\t\t// no module.loaded needed\n\t\texports: {}\n\t};\n\n\t// Execute the module function\n\t__webpack_modules__[moduleId](module, module.exports, __webpack_require__);\n\n\t// Return the exports of the module\n\treturn module.exports;\n}\n\n","// define getter functions for harmony exports\n__webpack_require__.d = (exports, definition) => {\n\tfor(var key in definition) {\n\t\tif(__webpack_require__.o(definition, key) && !__webpack_require__.o(exports, key)) {\n\t\t\tObject.defineProperty(exports, key, { enumerable: true, get: definition[key] });\n\t\t}\n\t}\n};","__webpack_require__.o = (obj, prop) => (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(obj, prop))","// define __esModule on exports\n__webpack_require__.r = (exports) => {\n\tif(typeof Symbol !== 'undefined' && Symbol.toStringTag) {\n\t\tObject.defineProperty(exports, Symbol.toStringTag, { value: 'Module' });\n\t}\n\tObject.defineProperty(exports, '__esModule', { value: true });\n};","import { CONFIG } from '../config/constants.js';\nimport { SELECTORS } from '../config/selectors.js';\nimport { Logger } from '../core/logger.js';\nimport { Database } from '../core/database.js';\nimport { GhostCursor } from '../features/ghost-cursor.js';\nimport { Scanner } from '../features/scanner.js';\nimport { Panel } from '../features/ui-panel.js';\nimport { wait, random, randomGaussian, getElementCenter } from '../utils/helpers.js';\n\nlet isRunning = false;\nlet config = { ...CONFIG };\n\nconst Log = {\n    info: (msg) => { Logger.info(msg); Panel.log(msg, 'info'); },\n    error: (msg) => { Logger.error(msg); Panel.log(msg, 'error'); },\n    think: (msg) => { Panel.log(` ${msg}`, 'info'); }\n};\n\nconst Bot = {\n    async start() {\n        if (isRunning) return;\n        isRunning = true;\n        \n        Panel.setStatus(true);\n        GhostCursor.init(); // Ensure visibility\n        \n        const storage = await chrome.storage.local.get(\"config\");\n        if (storage.config) config = { ...config, ...storage.config };\n        \n        chrome.runtime.sendMessage({ action: \"ATTACH_DEBUGGER\" });\n        Log.info(`Cycle Started. Safe Mode: ON`);\n        \n        document.body.click(); // Ensure focus\n        \n        this.loop();\n    },\n    \n    stop() {\n        isRunning = false;\n        Panel.setStatus(false);\n        Log.info(\"Cycle Stopped.\");\n    },\n    \n    async loop() {\n        while (isRunning) {\n            // --- PHASE 1: NAVIGATION ---\n            const navChance = Math.random();\n            \n            // Correction (5%)\n            if (navChance < 0.05) {\n                Log.think(\"Correction: Overshot...\");\n                if (Math.random() > 0.5) await this.sendKey(\"k\");\n                else await this.scrollSmoothly(-200);\n                await wait(random(1000, 2000));\n            }\n            // Mouse Scroll (30%)\n            else if (navChance < 0.35) {\n                Log.think(\"Nav: Mouse Scroll\");\n                await this.parkMouse(); // Keep mouse safe\n                await this.scrollSmoothly(random(300, 600));\n                await wait(random(500, 1200));\n                await this.sendKey(\"j\"); // Snap focus\n            } \n            // Key J (65%)\n            else {\n                Log.think(\"Nav: Key 'J'\");\n                await this.sendKey(\"j\");\n            }\n            \n            // --- PHASE 2: READING ---\n            const readTime = randomGaussian(1500, 4500); \n            Log.think(`Reading (${Math.floor(readTime)}ms)...`);\n            await wait(readTime);\n            \n            if (!isRunning) break;\n\n            // --- PHASE 3: SCANNING ---\n            const tweet = Scanner.readActiveTweet();\n            if (!tweet) {\n                Log.think(\"No valid tweet. Skipping.\");\n                await wait(800); \n                continue;\n            }\n\n            // --- PHASE 4: DECISION ---\n            if (Scanner.hasKeyword(tweet.text, config.KEYWORDS)) {\n                Log.info(`MATCH: \"${tweet.text.substring(0, 30)}...\"`);\n                await this.performReply(tweet);\n                \n                const cooldown = randomGaussian(10000, 25000); \n                Log.think(`Cooling down (${Math.floor(cooldown/1000)}s)...`);\n                await wait(cooldown);\n            }\n        }\n    },\n\n    async performReply(tweet) {\n        const replyText = config.REPLIES[random(0, config.REPLIES.length - 1)];\n        \n        // 1. Park mouse safely before opening anything\n        // This prevents the \"random movement\" inside the modal\n        await this.parkMouse();\n        \n        Log.think(\"Opening reply modal...\");\n        await this.sendKey(\"r\");\n        await wait(2500); // Wait for animation\n\n        const inputEl = document.querySelector(SELECTORS.INPUT_YZ);\n        if (!inputEl) {\n            Log.error(\"Modal failed to load.\");\n            await this.sendKey(\"Escape\");\n            return;\n        }\n\n        Log.think(`Typing reply...`);\n        // Note: We do NOT move the mouse to the input box anymore.\n        // We just type while the mouse is safely parked.\n        \n        // This 'await' now waits for the BACKGROUND process to fully finish typing\n        // regardless of how long it takes. No more cut-offs.\n        await chrome.runtime.sendMessage({ action: \"TYPE\", text: replyText });\n        \n        // Extra human hesitation after typing finishes\n        await wait(random(800, 1500));\n\n        if (config.SIMULATION_MODE) {\n            Log.info(\"SIM: Discarding.\");\n            await this.sendKey(\"Escape\");\n            await wait(800);\n            \n            const confirmBtn = document.querySelector(SELECTORS.DISCARD_BTN);\n            if (confirmBtn) {\n                const btnCenter = getElementCenter(confirmBtn);\n                await chrome.runtime.sendMessage({ action: \"MOVE_MOUSE\", x: btnCenter.x, y: btnCenter.y });\n                await chrome.runtime.sendMessage({ action: \"CLICK\" });\n            }\n        } else {\n            Log.info(\"SENDING.\");\n            await this.sendKey(\"Enter\", 2); // Ctrl + Enter\n            await Database.add({ type: \"REPLY\", text: replyText, target: tweet.user });\n        }\n        \n        await wait(2000);\n        await this.parkMouse(); // Ensure we end parked\n    },\n\n    async parkMouse() {\n        const { innerWidth, innerHeight } = window;\n        // Park in the right 15% of the screen, middle height\n        const safeX = innerWidth - (innerWidth * 0.15) + random(-20, 20); \n        const safeY = (innerHeight / 2) + random(-100, 100); \n        \n        await chrome.runtime.sendMessage({ action: \"MOVE_MOUSE\", x: safeX, y: safeY });\n    },\n\n    async scrollSmoothly(amount) {\n        window.scrollBy({ top: amount, behavior: 'smooth' });\n        await wait(500);\n    },\n\n    async sendKey(key, modifier = 0) {\n        await chrome.runtime.sendMessage({ action: \"PRESS\", key, modifier });\n    }\n};\n\n// --- INIT ---\nPanel.init();\nGhostCursor.init();\n\ndocument.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {\n    if (e.altKey && e.code === 'KeyS') {\n        e.preventDefault();\n        if (isRunning) Bot.stop();\n        else Bot.start();\n    }\n});\n\nchrome.runtime.onMessage.addListener((req) => {\n    if (req.action === \"START_BOT\") Bot.start();\n    if (req.action === \"STOP_BOT\") Bot.stop();\n    if (req.type === \"DRAW_CURSOR\") GhostCursor.move(req.x, req.y);\n    if (req.type === \"DRAW_CLICK\") GhostCursor.click();\n});"],"names":[],"ignoreList":[],"sourceRoot":""}
END FILE: ./dist/content.js.map

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Ghost Bot Dashboard</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="dashboard.css">
</head>
<body>
    <div class="app-container">
        <nav class="sidebar">
            <div class="logo">Ghost Bot </div>
            <ul class="menu">
                <li class="menu-item active" data-tab="config"> Configuration</li>
                <li class="menu-item" data-tab="database"> Activity Log</li>
            </ul>
        </nav>

        <main class="content">
            
            <section id="tab-config" class="tab-content active">
                <h2>Bot Configuration</h2>
                
                <div class="card">
                    <h3>Simulation Mode</h3>
                    <p class="hint">Enable this to test the bot without actually posting replies.</p>
                    <div class="row">
                        <label class="toggle-label">
                            <input type="checkbox" id="conf-simulation"> 
                            <span>Enable Simulation Mode (Safe)</span>
                        </label>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="card">
                    <h3>Targeting</h3>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label>Keywords (comma separated)</label>
                        <input type="text" id="conf-keywords" placeholder="gm, good morning, rise and shine">
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label>Reply Templates (one per line)</label>
                        <textarea id="conf-replies" rows="8" placeholder="GM! &#10;Rise and grind!"></textarea>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="actions">
                    <button id="btn-save" class="btn primary">Save Settings</button>
                    <span id="save-msg" class="fade-msg">Saved!</span>
                </div>
            </section>

            <section id="tab-database" class="tab-content">
                <div class="header-row">
                    <h2>Activity History</h2>
                    <div class="controls">
                        <button id="btn-refresh" class="btn secondary">Refresh</button>
                        <button id="btn-clear" class="btn danger">Clear History</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="table-container">
                    <table>
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <th>Time</th>
                                <th>Type</th>
                                <th>Content</th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tbody id="table-body">
                            </tbody>
                    </table>
                </div>
            </section>

        </main>
    </div>
    <script type="module" src="dashboard.js"></script>
</body>
</html>

function _regeneratorDefine2(e, r, n, t) { var i = Object.defineProperty; try { i({}, "", {}); } catch (e) { i = 0; } _regeneratorDefine2 = function _regeneratorDefine(e, r, n, t) { function o(r, n) { _regeneratorDefine2(e, r, function (e) { return this._invoke(r, n, e); }); } r ? i ? i(e, r, { value: n, enumerable: !t, configurable: !t, writable: !t }) : e[r] = n : (o("next", 0), o("throw", 1), o("return", 2)); }, _regeneratorDefine2(e, r, n, t); }
function ownKeys(e, r) { var t = Object.keys(e); if (Object.getOwnPropertySymbols) { var o = Object.getOwnPropertySymbols(e); r && (o = o.filter(function (r) { return Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(e, r).enumerable; })), t.push.apply(t, o); } return t; }
function _objectSpread(e) { for (var r = 1; r < arguments.length; r++) { var t = null != arguments[r] ? arguments[r] : {}; r % 2 ? ownKeys(Object(t), !0).forEach(function (r) { _defineProperty(e, r, t[r]); }) : Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors ? Object.defineProperties(e, Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors(t)) : ownKeys(Object(t)).forEach(function (r) { Object.defineProperty(e, r, Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(t, r)); }); } return e; }
function _defineProperty(e, r, t) { return (r = _toPropertyKey(r)) in e ? Object.defineProperty(e, r, { value: t, enumerable: !0, configurable: !0, writable: !0 }) : e[r] = t, e; }
function _toPropertyKey(t) { var i = _toPrimitive(t, "string"); return "symbol" == _typeof(i) ? i : i + ""; }
function _toPrimitive(t, r) { if ("object" != _typeof(t) || !t) return t; var e = t[Symbol.toPrimitive]; if (void 0 !== e) { var i = e.call(t, r || "default"); if ("object" != _typeof(i)) return i; throw new TypeError("@@toPrimitive must return a primitive value."); } return ("string" === r ? String : Number)(t); }
function asyncGeneratorStep(n, t, e, r, o, a, c) { try { var i = n[a](c), u = i.value; } catch (n) { return void e(n); } i.done ? t(u) : Promise.resolve(u).then(r, o); }
function _asyncToGenerator(n) { return function () { var t = this, e = arguments; return new Promise(function (r, o) { var a = n.apply(t, e); function _next(n) { asyncGeneratorStep(a, r, o, _next, _throw, "next", n); } function _throw(n) { asyncGeneratorStep(a, r, o, _next, _throw, "throw", n); } _next(void 0); }); }; }
// src/features/input-sim.js
// This runs in BACKGROUND context

var virtualMouse = {
  x: 100,
  y: 100
};
var KEY_DEFINITIONS = {
  'j': {
    code: 'KeyJ',
    key: 'j',
    text: 'j',
    keyCode: 74
  },
  'k': {
    code: 'KeyK',
    key: 'k',
    text: 'k',
    keyCode: 75
  },
  'r': {
    code: 'KeyR',
    key: 'r',
    text: 'r',
    keyCode: 82
  },
  'Enter': {
    code: 'Enter',
    key: 'Enter',
    text: '\r',
    keyCode: 13
  },
  'Escape': {
    code: 'Escape',
    key: 'Escape',
    text: '',
    keyCode: 27
  },
  'ArrowDown': {
    code: 'ArrowDown',
    key: 'ArrowDown',
    text: '',
    keyCode: 40
  },
  'ArrowUp': {
    code: 'ArrowUp',
    key: 'ArrowUp',
    text: '',
    keyCode: 38
  }
};

// --- PHYSICS ENGINE ---

function cubicBezier(t, p0, p1, p2, p3) {
  var oneMinusT = 1 - t;
  var oneMinusTSqr = oneMinusT * oneMinusT;
  var oneMinusTCube = oneMinusTSqr * oneMinusT;
  var tSqr = t * t;
  var tCube = tSqr * t;
  var x = oneMinusTCube * p0.x + 3 * oneMinusTSqr * t * p1.x + 3 * oneMinusT * tSqr * p2.x + tCube * p3.x;
  var y = oneMinusTCube * p0.y + 3 * oneMinusTSqr * t * p1.y + 3 * oneMinusT * tSqr * p2.y + tCube * p3.y;
  return {
    x: x,
    y: y
  };
}
function generateHumanPath(start, end) {
  var distance = Math.hypot(end.x - start.x, end.y - start.y);

  // Less dramatic arc for short moves, more for long ones
  var arcScale = Math.min(distance * 0.3, 100);
  var spread = (Math.random() - 0.5) * arcScale;
  var p0 = start;
  var p3 = end;
  var p1 = {
    x: start.x + (end.x - start.x) * 0.25 + spread,
    y: start.y + (end.y - start.y) * 0.25 + spread
  };
  var p2 = {
    x: start.x + (end.x - start.x) * 0.75 + spread,
    y: start.y + (end.y - start.y) * 0.75 - spread
  };
  return {
    p0: p0,
    p1: p1,
    p2: p2,
    p3: p3,
    distance: distance
  };
}
function moveMouseSmoothly(_x, _x2, _x3) {
  return _moveMouseSmoothly.apply(this, arguments);
}
function _moveMouseSmoothly() {
  _moveMouseSmoothly = _asyncToGenerator(/*#__PURE__*/_regenerator().m(function _callee(tabId, toX, toY) {
    var start, end, path, speed, duration, steps, i, t, easedT, pos, _t;
    return _regenerator().w(function (_context) {
      while (1) switch (_context.p = _context.n) {
        case 0:
          start = _objectSpread({}, virtualMouse);
          end = {
            x: toX,
            y: toY
          };
          path = generateHumanPath(start, end); // SLOWER SPEED: 0.5 pixels per ms (was 0.8)
          // This makes the cursor feel "heavier" and less erratic.
          speed = 0.5;
          duration = Math.max(path.distance / speed, 400); // Minimum 400ms duration
          steps = Math.floor(duration / 8);
          i = 0;
        case 1:
          if (!(i <= steps)) {
            _context.n = 7;
            break;
          }
          t = i / steps; // Smoother easing (Ease-In-Out-Sine approximation)
          easedT = -(Math.cos(Math.PI * t) - 1) / 2;
          pos = cubicBezier(easedT, path.p0, path.p1, path.p2, path.p3);
          _context.p = 2;
          _context.n = 3;
          return chrome["debugger"].sendCommand({
            tabId: tabId
          }, "Input.dispatchMouseEvent", {
            type: "mouseMoved",
            x: pos.x,
            y: pos.y,
            button: "none",
            clickCount: 0
          });
        case 3:
          chrome.tabs.sendMessage(tabId, {
            type: "DRAW_CURSOR",
            x: pos.x,
            y: pos.y
          })["catch"](function () {});
          _context.n = 5;
          break;
        case 4:
          _context.p = 4;
          _t = _context.v;
          return _context.a(3, 7);
        case 5:
          _context.n = 6;
          return new Promise(function (r) {
            return setTimeout(r, 8);
          });
        case 6:
          i++;
          _context.n = 1;
          break;
        case 7:
          virtualMouse = end;
        case 8:
          return _context.a(2);
      }
    }, _callee, null, [[2, 4]]);
  }));
  return _moveMouseSmoothly.apply(this, arguments);
}
function clickMouse(_x4) {
  return _clickMouse.apply(this, arguments);
}
function _clickMouse() {
  _clickMouse = _asyncToGenerator(/*#__PURE__*/_regenerator().m(function _callee2(tabId) {
    var _virtualMouse, x, y, holdTime, _t2;
    return _regenerator().w(function (_context2) {
      while (1) switch (_context2.p = _context2.n) {
        case 0:
          _virtualMouse = virtualMouse, x = _virtualMouse.x, y = _virtualMouse.y;
          _context2.p = 1;
          _context2.n = 2;
          return chrome["debugger"].sendCommand({
            tabId: tabId
          }, "Input.dispatchMouseEvent", {
            type: "mousePressed",
            x: x,
            y: y,
            button: "left",
            clickCount: 1
          });
        case 2:
          chrome.tabs.sendMessage(tabId, {
            type: "DRAW_CLICK"
          })["catch"](function () {});

          // Longer hold time (human click)
          holdTime = Math.floor(Math.random() * (180 - 90 + 1) + 90);
          _context2.n = 3;
          return new Promise(function (r) {
            return setTimeout(r, holdTime);
          });
        case 3:
          _context2.n = 4;
          return chrome["debugger"].sendCommand({
            tabId: tabId
          }, "Input.dispatchMouseEvent", {
            type: "mouseReleased",
            x: x,
            y: y,
            button: "left",
            clickCount: 1
          });
        case 4:
          _context2.n = 6;
          break;
        case 5:
          _context2.p = 5;
          _t2 = _context2.v;
        case 6:
          return _context2.a(2);
      }
    }, _callee2, null, [[1, 5]]);
  }));
  return _clickMouse.apply(this, arguments);
}

  return _typeKeys.apply(this, arguments);
}
function _typeKeys() {
  _typeKeys = _asyncToGenerator(/*#__PURE__*/_regenerator().m(function _callee3(tabId, text) {
    var _iterator, _step, _loop, _t3, _t4;
    return _regenerator().w(function (_context4) {
      while (1) switch (_context4.p = _context4.n) {
        case 0:
          _context4.p = 0;
          _iterator = _createForOfIteratorHelper(text);
          _context4.p = 1;
          _loop = /*#__PURE__*/_regenerator().m(function _loop() {
            var _char, typeSpeed;
            return _regenerator().w(function (_context3) {
              while (1) switch (_context3.n) {
                case 0:
                  _char = _step.value;
                  _context3.n = 1;
                  return chrome["debugger"].sendCommand({
                    tabId: tabId
                  }, "Input.dispatchKeyEvent", {
                    type: "keyDown",
                    text: _char
                  });
                case 1:
                  // Slower typing
                  typeSpeed = Math.random() * 80 + 40;
                  _context3.n = 2;
                  return new Promise(function (r) {
                    return setTimeout(r, typeSpeed);
                  });
                case 2:
                  _context3.n = 3;
                  return chrome["debugger"].sendCommand({
                    tabId: tabId
                  }, "Input.dispatchKeyEvent", {
                    type: "keyUp",
                    text: _char
                  });
                case 3:
                  _context3.n = 4;
                  return new Promise(function (r) {

                  });
                case 4:
                  return _context3.a(2);
              }
            }, _loop);
          });
          _iterator.s();
        case 2:
          if ((_step = _iterator.n()).done) {
            _context4.n = 4;
            break;
          }
          return _context4.d(_regeneratorValues(_loop()), 3);
        case 3:
          _context4.n = 2;
          break;
        case 4:
          _context4.n = 6;
          break;
        case 5:
          _context4.p = 5;
          _t3 = _context4.v;
          _iterator.e(_t3);
        case 6:
          _context4.p = 6;
          _iterator.f();
          return _context4.f(6);
        case 7:
          _context4.n = 9;
          break;
        case 8:
          _context4.p = 8;
          _t4 = _context4.v;
        case 9:

      }
    }, _callee3, null, [[1, 5, 6, 7], [0, 8]]);
  }));
  return _typeKeys.apply(this, arguments);
}
function pressKey(_x7, _x8) {
  return _pressKey.apply(this, arguments);
}
function _pressKey() {
  _pressKey = _asyncToGenerator(/*#__PURE__*/_regenerator().m(function _callee4(tabId, keyName) {
    var modifiers,
      def,
      _args5 = arguments,
      _t5;
    return _regenerator().w(function (_context5) {
      while (1) switch (_context5.p = _context5.n) {
        case 0:
          modifiers = _args5.length > 2 && _args5[2] !== undefined ? _args5[2] : 0;
          def = KEY_DEFINITIONS[keyName] || {
            key: keyName,
            code: keyName,
            text: ""
          };
          _context5.p = 1;
          _context5.n = 2;
          return chrome["debugger"].sendCommand({
            tabId: tabId
          }, "Input.dispatchKeyEvent", {
            type: "keyDown",
            key: def.key,
            code: def.code,
            text: def.text,
            unmodifiedText: def.text,
            windowsVirtualKeyCode: def.keyCode,
            nativeVirtualKeyCode: def.keyCode,
            modifiers: modifiers
          });
        case 2:
          _context5.n = 3;
          return new Promise(function (r) {
            return setTimeout(r, Math.random() * 60 + 60);
          });
        case 3:
          _context5.n = 4;
          return chrome["debugger"].sendCommand({
            tabId: tabId
          }, "Input.dispatchKeyEvent", {
            type: "keyUp",
            key: def.key,
            code: def.code,
            modifiers: modifiers
          });
        case 4:
          _context5.n = 6;
          break;
        case 5:
          _context5.p = 5;
          _t5 = _context5.v;
          console.error("Key Error:", _t5);
        case 6:
          return _context5.a(2);
      }
    }, _callee4, null, [[1, 5]]);
  }));
  return _pressKey.apply(this, arguments);
}

/***/ })

/******/ 	});

/******/ 	// The module cache
/******/ 	var __webpack_module_cache__ = {};
/******/ 	
/******/ 	// The require function
/******/ 	function __webpack_require__(moduleId) {
/******/ 		// Check if module is in cache
/******/ 		var cachedModule = __webpack_module_cache__[moduleId];
/******/ 		if (cachedModule !== undefined) {
/******/ 			return cachedModule.exports;
/******/ 		}
/******/ 		// Create a new module (and put it into the cache)
/******/ 		var module = __webpack_module_cache__[moduleId] = {
/******/ 			// no module.id needed
/******/ 			// no module.loaded needed
/******/ 			exports: {}
/******/ 		};
/******/ 	
/******/ 		// Execute the module function
/******/ 		__webpack_modules__[moduleId](module, module.exports, __webpack_require__);
/******/ 	
/******/ 		// Return the exports of the module
/******/ 		return module.exports;
/******/ 	}
/******/ 	
/************************************************************************/
/******/ 	/* webpack/runtime/define property getters */
/******/ 	(() => {
/******/ 		// define getter functions for harmony exports
/******/ 		__webpack_require__.d = (exports, definition) => {
/******/ 			for(var key in definition) {
/******/ 				if(__webpack_require__.o(definition, key) && !__webpack_require__.o(exports, key)) {
/******/ 					Object.defineProperty(exports, key, { enumerable: true, get: definition[key] });
/******/ 				}
/******/ 			}
/******/ 		};
/******/ 	})();
/******/ 	
/******/ 	/* webpack/runtime/hasOwnProperty shorthand */
/******/ 	(() => {
/******/ 		__webpack_require__.o = (obj, prop) => (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(obj, prop))
/******/ 	})();

/******/ 			}

/******/ 		};

// --- OPEN DASHBOARD (Icon Click) ---
chrome.action.onClicked.addListener(function () {
  chrome.tabs.create({
    url: "dashboard.html"
  });
});

// --- MESSAGE HANDLER ---
chrome.runtime.onMessage.addListener(function (req, sender, sendResponse) {
  var _sender$tab;
  // 1. Open Dashboard request from Content Script (Panel)
  if (req.action === "OPEN_DASHBOARD") {
    chrome.tabs.create({
      url: "dashboard.html"
    });
    return; // Synchronous
  }
  var tabId = (_sender$tab = sender.tab) === null || _sender$tab === void 0 ? void 0 : _sender$tab.id;
  if (!tabId) return;
  if (req.action === "ATTACH_DEBUGGER") {
    chrome["debugger"].attach({
      tabId: tabId
    }, "1.3", function () {
      if (chrome.runtime.lastError) console.log("Debugger attached");
    });
    return;
  }

  // 2. Handle Input Actions Synchronously
  // We wrap this in an async function and return true to keep the message channel open
  var handleInput = /*#__PURE__*/function () {
    var _ref = _asyncToGenerator(/*#__PURE__*/_regenerator().m(function _callee() {
      var _t;
      return _regenerator().w(function (_context) {
        while (1) switch (_context.p = _context.n) {
          case 0:
            _context.p = 0;
            if (!(req.action === "MOVE_MOUSE")) {
              _context.n = 1;
              break;
            }
            _context.n = 1;
            return (0,_features_input_sim_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.moveMouseSmoothly)(tabId, req.x, req.y);
          case 1:
            if (!(req.action === "CLICK")) {
              _context.n = 2;
              break;
            }
            _context.n = 2;
            return (0,_features_input_sim_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.clickMouse)(tabId);
          case 2:
            if (!(req.action === "TYPE")) {
              _context.n = 3;
              break;
            }
            _context.n = 3;
            return (0,_features_input_sim_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.typeKeys)(tabId, req.text);
          case 3:
            if (!(req.action === "PRESS")) {
              _context.n = 4;
              break;
            }
            _context.n = 4;
            return (0,_features_input_sim_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.pressKey)(tabId, req.key, req.modifier);
          case 4:
            sendResponse({
              status: "done"
            });
            _context.n = 6;
            break;
          case 5:

              status: "error",
              message: _t.message
            });

    };
  }();

  return true; // CRITICAL: Tells Chrome we will sendResponse asynchronously
});

tbody.innerHTML = '';\n        \n        if (records.length === 0) {\n            tbody.innerHTML = '<tr><td colspan=\"3\" style=\"text-align:center; color:#777;\">No activity yet.</td></tr>';\n            return;\n        }\n\n        records.forEach(row => {\n            const tr = document.createElement('tr');\n            tr.innerHTML = `\n                <td>${new Date(row.timestamp).toLocaleString()}</td>\n                <td><span class=\"tag\">${row.type}</span></td>\n                <td>${row.text || '-'}</td>\n            `;\n            tbody.appendChild(tr);\n        });\n    } catch (e) {\n        tbody.innerHTML = `<tr><td colspan=\"3\" style=\"color:red\">Error: ${e.message}</td></tr>`;\n                     keyPath: 'id',
                    autoIncrement: true

                }
              };

              };

/***/ "./src/features/ghost-cursor.js":
/*!**************************************!*\
  !*** ./src/features/ghost-cursor.js ***!
  \**************************************/
/***/ ((__unused_webpack_module, __webpack_exports__, __webpack_require__) => {

__webpack_require__.r(__webpack_exports__);
/* harmony export */ __webpack_require__.d(__webpack_exports__, {
/* harmony export */   GhostCursor: () => (/* binding */ GhostCursor)
/* harmony export */ });
// src/features/ghost-cursor.js
var cursorEl = null;
var GhostCursor = {
  init: function init() {
    if (document.getElementById('ghost-cursor')) return;
    cursorEl = document.createElement('div');
    cursorEl.id = 'ghost-cursor';

    // Define styles inline to ensure they apply
    Object.assign(cursorEl.style, {
      position: 'fixed',
      top: '0',
      left: '0',
      width: '18px',
      height: '18px',
      backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 0, 50, 0.8)',
      border: '2px solid white',
      borderRadius: '50%',
      zIndex: '2147483647',
      pointerEvents: 'none',
      transition: 'transform 0.15s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.1, 0.25, 1)',
      // Smooth CSS interpolation
      transform: 'translate3d(-100px, -100px, 0)',
      boxShadow: '0 0 15px rgba(255, 0, 50, 0.6)'
    });
    document.documentElement.appendChild(cursorEl);
  },
  move: function move(x, y) {
    if (!cursorEl) this.init();
    cursorEl.style.transform = "translate3d(".concat(x, "px, ").concat(y, "px, 0)");
  },
  click: function click() {
    if (!cursorEl) return;
    var oldColor = cursorEl.style.backgroundColor;
    cursorEl.style.backgroundColor = '#00ff41'; // Bright green click
    cursorEl.style.transform += ' scale(0.8)';
    setTimeout(function () {
      cursorEl.style.backgroundColor = oldColor;
      cursorEl.style.transform = cursorEl.style.transform.replace(' scale(0.8)', '');
    }, 150);
  }
};

/***/ }),

/***/ "./src/features/scanner.js":
/*!*********************************!*\
  !*** ./src/features/scanner.js ***!
  \*********************************/
/***/ ((__unused_webpack_module, __webpack_exports__, __webpack_require__) => {

__webpack_require__.r(__webpack_exports__);
/* harmony export */ __webpack_require__.d(__webpack_exports__, {
/* harmony export */   Scanner: () => (/* binding */ Scanner)
/* harmony export */ });
/* harmony import */ var _config_selectors_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__ = __webpack_require__(/*! ../config/selectors.js */ "./src/config/selectors.js");

var Scanner = {
  readActiveTweet: function readActiveTweet() {
    // RELIABILITY UPGRADE: 
    // When using 'J', Twitter natively focuses the tweet element.
    // We can just grab 'document.activeElement' which is 100% accurate.
    var focused = document.activeElement;
    var article = focused === null || focused === void 0 ? void 0 : focused.closest(_config_selectors_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.SELECTORS.TWEET);
    if (!article) return null;
    var textEl = article.querySelector(_config_selectors_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.SELECTORS.TEXT);
    var userEl = article.querySelector(_config_selectors_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.SELECTORS.USER);
    return {
      text: textEl ? textEl.innerText.toLowerCase() : "",
      user: userEl ? userEl.innerText : "Unknown",
      element: article
    };
  },
  hasKeyword: function hasKeyword(text, keywords) {
    if (!text) return false;
    return keywords.some(function (k) {
      return text.includes(k.toLowerCase());
    });
  }
};

/***/ }),

/* Fills all remaining height */\n                overflow-y: auto;\n                background: #000;\n                border: 1px solid #222;\n                border-radius: 4px;\n                padding: 8px;\n                margin-bottom: 10px;\n                display: flex;\n                flex-direction: column-reverse; \n            }\n            \n            .log-entry {\n                font-family: 'Consolas', 'Monaco', monospace;\n                font-size: 11px;\n                margin-bottom: 4px;\n                line-height: 1.4;\n                color: #888;\n                border-bottom: 1px solid #111;\n                word-wrap: break-word;\n            }\n            .log-entry:first-child { color: #00ff41; }\n            .ghost-console::-webkit-scrollbar-track { background: #111; }\n            .ghost-console::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: #444; border-radius: 2px; }\n\n            .ghost-footer { \n                display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; \n                color: #666; font-size: 11px; flex-shrink: 0;\n            }\n            .key-badge { background: #2a2a2a; padding: 2px 5px; border-radius: 4px; color: #eee; border: 1px solid #444; font-size: 10px;}\n            .dash-link { color: #1d9bf0; text-decoration: none; cursor: pointer; transition: color 0.2s; font-weight: 600;}\n            .dash-link:hover { color: #fff; text-decoration: underline; }\n        ";
    document.head.appendChild(style);
    this.el = document.createElement('div');
    this.el.id = 'ghost-panel';
    this.el.innerHTML = "\n            <div class=\"ghost-header\">\n                <span class=\"ghost-title\">\uD83D\uDC7B Ghost Bot</span>\n                <span id=\"ghost-status\" class=\"ghost-status\">STOPPED</span>\n            </div>\n            \n            <div id=\"ghost-console\" class=\"ghost-console\">\n                <div class=\"log-entry\">UI Initialized. Height Maximized.</div>\n            </div>\n\n            <div class=\"ghost-footer\">\n                <span>Toggle: <span class=\"key-badge\">Alt</span> + <span class=\"key-badge\">S</span></span>\n                <a id=\"ghost-dash-link\" class=\"dash-link\">Dashboard \u2197</a>\n            </div>\n        ";
    document.body.appendChild(this.el);
    this.statusEl = this.el.querySelector('#ghost-status');
    this.logContainer = this.el.querySelector('#ghost-console');
    this.el.querySelector('#ghost-dash-link').addEventListener('click', function () {
      chrome.runtime.sendMessage({
        action: "OPEN_DASHBOARD"
      });
    });
  },
  setStatus: function setStatus(isRunning) {
    if (!this.statusEl) return;
    if (isRunning) {
      this.statusEl.textContent = "RUNNING";
      this.statusEl.className = "ghost-status running";
    } else {
      this.statusEl.textContent = "STOPPED";
      this.statusEl.className = "ghost-status";
    }
  },
  log: function log(msg) {
    var type = arguments.length > 1 && arguments[1] !== undefined ? arguments[1] : 'info';
    if (!this.logContainer) return;
    var time = new Date().toLocaleTimeString().split(' ')[0];
    var entry = document.createElement('div');
    entry.className = type === 'error' ? 'log-entry error' : 'log-entry';
    entry.innerHTML = "<span class=\"time\">[".concat(time, "]</span> ").concat(msg);
    this.logContainer.prepend(entry);
    if (this.logContainer.children.length > 100) {
      this.logContainer.removeChild(this.logContainer.lastChild);
    }
  }
};

/***/ }),

  !*** ./src/utils/helpers.js ***!
  \******************************/
/***/ ((__unused_webpack_module, __webpack_exports__, __webpack_require__) => {

__webpack_require__.r(__webpack_exports__);
/* harmony export */ __webpack_require__.d(__webpack_exports__, {
/* harmony export */   getElementCenter: () => (/* binding */ getElementCenter),

/* harmony export */   randomGaussian: () => (/* binding */ _randomGaussian),
/* harmony export */   wait: () => (/* binding */ wait)
/* harmony export */ });
// src/utils/helpers.js

var wait = function wait(ms) {
  return new Promise(function (resolve) {
    return setTimeout(resolve, ms);
  });
};
var random = function random(min, max) {
  return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1) + min);
};
var _randomGaussian = function randomGaussian(min, max) {
  var skew = arguments.length > 2 && arguments[2] !== undefined ? arguments[2] : 1;
  var u = 0,
    v = 0;
  while (u === 0) u = Math.random();
  while (v === 0) v = Math.random();
  var num = Math.sqrt(-2.0 * Math.log(u)) * Math.cos(2.0 * Math.PI * v);
  num = num / 10.0 + 0.5;
  if (num > 1 || num < 0) num = _randomGaussian(min, max, skew);
  num = Math.pow(num, skew);
  num *= max - min;
  num += min;
  return Math.floor(num);
};

var getElementCenter = function getElementCenter(el) {
  var rect = el.getBoundingClientRect();
  return {
    x: rect.left + rect.width / 2,
    y: rect.top + rect.height / 2
  };
};

/******/ 	}

var Log = {

    _features_ui_panel_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_6__.Panel.log(msg, 'info');

    _features_ui_panel_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_6__.Panel.log(msg, 'error');

    _features_ui_panel_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_6__.Panel.log("\uD83D\uDCAD ".concat(msg), 'info');

var Bot = {
  start: function start() {

    return _asyncToGenerator(/*#__PURE__*/_regenerator().m(function _callee() {
      var storage;
      return _regenerator().w(function (_context) {
        while (1) switch (_context.n) {
          case 0:

              _context.n = 1;
              break;
            }
            return _context.a(2);
          case 1:
            isRunning = true;
            _features_ui_panel_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_6__.Panel.setStatus(true);
            _features_ghost_cursor_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_4__.GhostCursor.init(); // Ensure visibility

          case 2:

  loop: function loop() {
    var _this2 = this;
    return _asyncToGenerator(/*#__PURE__*/_regenerator().m(function _callee2() {
      var navChance, readTime, tweet, cooldown;
      return _regenerator().w(function (_context2) {
        while (1) switch (_context2.n) {
          case 0:
            if (!isRunning) {
              _context2.n = 18;
              break;
            }
            // --- PHASE 1: NAVIGATION ---
            navChance = Math.random(); // Correction (5%)
            if (!(navChance < 0.05)) {
              _context2.n = 5;
              break;
            }
            Log.think("Correction: Overshot...");
            if (!(Math.random() > 0.5)) {
              _context2.n = 2;
              break;
            }
            _context2.n = 1;
            return _this2.sendKey("k");
          case 1:
            _context2.n = 3;
            break;
          case 2:

            break;

              _context2.n = 10;
              break;

            _context2.n = 6;

          case 6:

          case 10:

            _context2.n = 12;

          case 12:

              _context2.n = 13;
              break;

          case 13:

  },
  performReply: function performReply(tweet) {

            _context3.n = 2;
            return _this3.sendKey("r");

            return _this3.sendKey("Escape");
          case 4:
            return _context3.a(2);
          case 5:

            // Note: We do NOT move the mouse to the input box anymore.
            // We just type while the mouse is safely parked.

            // This 'await' now waits for the BACKGROUND process to fully finish typing
            // regardless of how long it takes. No more cut-offs.
            _context3.n = 6;
            return chrome.runtime.sendMessage({
              action: "TYPE",
              text: replyText
            });
          case 6:
            _context3.n = 7;
            return (0,_utils_helpers_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_7__.wait)((0,_utils_helpers_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_7__.random)(800, 1500));
          case 7:

              _context3.n = 12;
              break;
            }

            _context3.n = 8;
            return _this3.sendKey("Escape");
          case 8:
            _context3.n = 9;
            return (0,_utils_helpers_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_7__.wait)(800);
          case 9:

            if (!confirmBtn) {
              _context3.n = 11;
              break;
            }
            btnCenter = (0,_utils_helpers_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_7__.getElementCenter)(confirmBtn);
            _context3.n = 10;
            return chrome.runtime.sendMessage({
              action: "MOVE_MOUSE",
              x: btnCenter.x,
              y: btnCenter.y
            });
          case 10:
            _context3.n = 11;
            return chrome.runtime.sendMessage({
              action: "CLICK"
            });
          case 11:
            _context3.n = 14;
            break;
          case 12:
            Log.info("SENDING.");
            _context3.n = 13;
            return _this3.sendKey("Enter", 2);
          case 13:
            _context3.n = 14;
            return _core_database_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.Database.add({
              type: "REPLY",
              text: replyText,
              target: tweet.user
            });
          case 14:
            _context3.n = 15;
            return (0,_utils_helpers_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_7__.wait)(2000);
          case 15:
            _context3.n = 16;
            return _this3.parkMouse();
          case 16:
            return _context3.a(2);
        }
      }, _callee3);
    }))();
  },
  parkMouse: function parkMouse() {
    return _asyncToGenerator(/*#__PURE__*/_regenerator().m(function _callee4() {
      var _window, innerWidth, innerHeight, safeX, safeY;
      return _regenerator().w(function (_context4) {
        while (1) switch (_context4.n) {
          case 0:
            _window = window, innerWidth = _window.innerWidth, innerHeight = _window.innerHeight; // Park in the right 15% of the screen, middle height
            safeX = innerWidth - innerWidth * 0.15 + (0,_utils_helpers_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_7__.random)(-20, 20);
            safeY = innerHeight / 2 + (0,_utils_helpers_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_7__.random)(-100, 100);
            _context4.n = 1;
            return chrome.runtime.sendMessage({
              action: "MOVE_MOUSE",
              x: safeX,
              y: safeY
            });
          case 1:
            return _context4.a(2);
        }
      }, _callee4);
    }))();
  },
  scrollSmoothly: function scrollSmoothly(amount) {
    return _asyncToGenerator(/*#__PURE__*/_regenerator().m(function _callee5() {
      return _regenerator().w(function (_context5) {
        while (1) switch (_context5.n) {
          case 0:
            window.scrollBy({
              top: amount,
              behavior: 'smooth'
            });
            _context5.n = 1;
            return (0,_utils_helpers_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_7__.wait)(500);
          case 1:
            return _context5.a(2);
        }
      }, _callee5);
    }))();
  },
  sendKey: function sendKey(key) {
    var _arguments = arguments;
    return _asyncToGenerator(/*#__PURE__*/_regenerator().m(function _callee6() {
      var modifier;
      return _regenerator().w(function (_context6) {
        while (1) switch (_context6.n) {
          case 0:
            modifier = _arguments.length > 1 && _arguments[1] !== undefined ? _arguments[1] : 0;
            _context6.n = 1;
            return chrome.runtime.sendMessage({
              action: "PRESS",
              key: key,
              modifier: modifier
            });
          case 1:
            return _context6.a(2);
        }
      }, _callee6);
    }))();
  }
};

// --- INIT ---
_features_ui_panel_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_6__.Panel.init();
_features_ghost_cursor_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_4__.GhostCursor.init();
document.addEventListener('keydown', function (e) {
  if (e.altKey && e.code === 'KeyS') {
    e.preventDefault();
    if (isRunning) Bot.stop();else Bot.start();
  }
});
chrome.runtime.onMessage.addListener(function (req) {
  if (req.action === "START_BOT") Bot.start();
  if (req.action === "STOP_BOT") Bot.stop();
  if (req.type === "DRAW_CURSOR") _features_ghost_cursor_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_4__.GhostCursor.move(req.x, req.y);
  if (req.type === "DRAW_CLICK") _features_ghost_cursor_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_4__.GhostCursor.click();
});
})();

/******/ })()
;
//# sourceMappingURL=content.js.map
END FILE: ./dist/content.js

  "host_permissions": ["https://x.com/*", "https://twitter.com/*"],
  "action": {},
  "background": { "service_worker": "background.js" },
  "content_scripts": [
    {
      "matches": ["https://twitter.com/*", "https://x.com/*"],
      "js": ["content.js"], 
      "run_at": "document_idle"
    }
  ],
  "web_accessible_resources": [
    {
      "resources": ["dashboard.html", "assets/*.png"],
      "matches": ["https://twitter.com/*", "https://x.com/*"]
    }
  ]
